INSERT ALL
INTO MSSAPP.MC_AC_HOLD_STK_TXN_DTL (AC_HOLD_STK_TXN_DTL_ID, AC_HOLD_STK_TXN_ID, HOLD_STK_TXN_TYP_CDE, TXN_REF_NUM, TXN_TYP_ID, AC_ID, CMPNY_CDE, INSTR_ID, INSTCL_ID, MRKT_ID, MRKT_BUSDATE, EXTRNL_REF_NUM, HOLD_STK_QTY, EXPR_DATE, HOLD_STK_STAT_CDE, HOLD_STK_CHNL_CDE, REMRK, HOLD_DATE, HOLD_BY, RELSE_DATE, RELSE_BY, RELSE_STK_QTY, SRC_SYS_CDE, REC_VER_NUM, INIT_TIME, LAST_UPD_TIME, LAST_UPD_BY, TAG_SEQ, INTRNL_REF) VALUES (#{item.acHoldStkTxnDtlId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.acHoldStkTxnId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.holdStkTxnTypCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.txnRefNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.txnTypId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.acId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cmpnyCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.instrId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.instclId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.mrktId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.mrktBusdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.extrnlRefNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.holdStkQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.exprDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.holdStkStatCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.holdStkChnlCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.remrk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.holdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.holdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.relseDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.relseBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.relseStkQty,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.srcSysCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.recVerNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.initTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.lastUpdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.lastUpdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tagSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.intrnlRef,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
SELECT 1 FROM DUAL
